mapper.select: select ono, total_price, regdate, pickup_time, c_msg, s.sno, c_id, o.state_code, reviewstate, o.lng, o.lat, s.u_id, i.co_name, os.state_name from tbl_ft_order o left join tbl_ft_sales s on o.sno=s.sno left join tbl_ft_info i on s.u_id=i.u_id left join tbl_order_state os on o.state_code=os.state_code where c_id=#{c_id} order by ono desc;
select count(*) from tbl_ft_order where c_id=#{c_id}
